Flask by example (How to build a polling app)

Welcome everyone!, This is the beginning of a new series where we’ll learn how to use flask by building a simple polling app. This series is going to be split into several parts because of the size of the app we’re building. At the end of this series we’ll have built a polling app, where the users can login, vote on various topics and leave comments, the comments can also be upvoted and downvoted so that the best comments get to the top for other users to see.
